note: Hatched in the mid-60s, always lived in Canberra (Australia), piano (quite badly) from age 5 to the present, hockey (‘field’ for Nth Americans) from 6 to early 20s (couple of scholarships at the AIS), ‘worked at’ (i.e. was paid by) the Australian Bureau of Stats for 32 years, did 12 years worth (approx) of Aikido - grading to 2nd Dan, travelled the world (a few times), keen snowboarder, and now just entered retirement. Sadly never overcome excessive use (abuse) of parentheses.
